ai-tika-vin02t39:1_1: They make a legal issue construction regarding it, saying “This is the same: the legal issue, the end of the legal issue,” “The legal issue is also used.”
ai-tika-vin02t39:2_0: The meaning is that in the scriptures. The meaning is, indications of the Dhamma, which is free from severed.
ai-tika-vin02t39:2_1: Those that fame, which was called “mind” in the name “accomplished” is what was said.
ai-tika-vin02t39:2_2: The aggregates, surrounded by the constituents aggregates, and is surrounded by the belief of the sense desires.
ai-tika-vin02t39:3_0: Because of the business of others, relying on what was done in the past, and creating a deed, he seeks what was done in the past.
ai-tika-vin02t39:3_2: pressing up to the third time,
ai-tika-vin02t39:4_0: it is a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-tika-vin02t39:5_0: Because of that a disciplinary issue, they will point out that legal issue, because of the answering of the business, disciplinary issues, responding others.
ai-tika-vin02t39:6_1: He said, “What is the thirty-six positions for eighteen years? ” and when asked, “What is the equal of the doing, etc., they reciting the aggregates, etc., they answer, “Namely, when there are opposites of their deeds?”
ai-tika-vin02t39:6_2: Resolution through the recollection of the Sangha, it is said to be “without entering the mouth” since it is in the presence of the Community, “has the purpose,”
